# Governance

The governance of this project is based on a model of open collaboration and consensus-building. We strive to make decisions collectively and transparently, with input from all contributors, following our [Code of Conduct](https://github.com/imliam/smarter-kit/blob/main/.github/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md) and [Contribution Guidelines](https://github.com/imliam/smarter-kit/blob/main/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md).

If any issues arise that cannot be resolved through discussion, **get in touch via our [support page](https://github.com/imliam/smarter-kit/blob/main/.github/SUPPORT.md).**
